verses.verse: Now <WG1161> we <WG2249> that are strong <WG1415> ought <WG3784> to bear <WG941> the infirmities <WG771> of the weak <WG102>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> to please <WG700> ourselves <WG1438>.

For <WG1063> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> pleased <WG700> not <WG3756> himself <WG1438>; but <WG235>, as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, The reproaches <WG3680> of them that reproached <WG3679> thee <WG4571> fell <WG1968> upon <WG1909> me <WG1691>.

For <WG1063> whatsoever things <WG3745> were written aforetime were written <WG4270> for <WG1519> our <WG2251> learning <WG4270>, that <WG2443> through <WG1223> patience <WG5281> and <WG2532> through <WG1223> comfort <WG3874> of the scriptures <WG1124> we might have <WG2192> hope <WG1680>.

Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of patience <WG5281> and <WG2532> of comfort <WG3874> grant <WG1325> you <WG5213> to be <WG846> of the same mind <WG5426> one <WG1722> with another <WG240> according to <WG2596> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>:

that <WG2443> with one <WG1520> accord <WG3661> ye may <WG1392> with <WG1722> one <WG1520> mouth <WG4750> glorify <WG1392> the God <WG2316> and Father <WG3962> of <WG2962> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.
Wherefore <WG1352> receive ye <WG4355> one another <WG240>, even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> received <WG4355> you <WG2248>, to <WG1519> the glory <WG1391> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1161> I say that <WG3004> Christ <WG5547> hath <WG1096> been <WG1096> made a minister <WG1249> of the circumcision <WG4061> for <WG5228> the truth <WG225> of God <WG2316>, that <WG1519> he might confirm <WG950> the promises <WG1860> given unto the fathers <WG3962>,

and <WG1161> that <WG1392> the Gentiles <WG1484> might glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> for <WG5228> his mercy <WG1656>; as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, Therefore1223, 5124 will I give praise <WG1843> unto thee <WG4671> among <WG1722> the Gentiles <WG1484>, And <WG2532> sing <WG5567> unto <WG3686> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he saith <WG3004>, Rejoice <WG2165>, ye Gentiles <WG1484>, with <WG3326> his <WG846> people <WG2992>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, Praise <WG134> the Lord <WG2962>, all <WG3956> ye Gentiles <WG1484>; And <WG2532> let all <WG3956> the peoples <WG2992> praise <WG1867> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, Isaiah <WG2268> saith <WG3004>, There shall be <WG2071> the root <WG4491> of Jesse <WG2421>, And <WG2532> he that ariseth <WG450> to rule over <WG757> the Gentiles <WG1484>; On <WG1909> him <WG846> shall <WG1679> the Gentiles <WG1484> hope <WG1679>.

Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of hope <WG1680> fill <WG4137> you <WG5209> with <WG5479> all <WG3956> joy <WG5479> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> in <WG1722> believing <WG4100>, that <WG1519> ye <WG5209> may abound <WG4052> in <WG1722> hope <WG1680>, in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>.

And <WG1161> I <WG1473> myself <WG846> also <WG2532> am persuaded <WG3982> of <WG4012> you <WG5216>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, that <WG3754> ye <WG2075> yourselves are2075, 2532 full <WG3324> of goodness <WG19>, filled <WG4137> with <WG1108> all <WG3956> knowledge <WG1108>, able <WG1410> also <WG2532> to admonish <WG3560> one another <WG240>.

But1161, Ruth I write <WG1125> the more boldly <WG5112> unto you <WG5213> in <WG575> some measure <WG3313>, as <WG5613> putting <WG1878> you <WG5209> again in remembrance <WG1878>, because of <WG1223> the grace <WG5485> that was given <WG1325> me <WG3427> of <WG5259> God <WG2316>,

that <WG1519> I <WG3165> should be <WG1511> a minister <WG3011> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> unto <WG1519> the Gentiles <WG1484>, ministering <WG2418> the gospel <WG2098> of God <WG2316>, that <WG2443> the offering up <WG4376> of the Gentiles <WG1484> might be <WG1096> made acceptable <WG2144>, being sanctified <WG37> by <WG1722> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>.
I have <WG2192> therefore <WG3767> my glorifying <WG2746> in <WG2746> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> in <WG2746> things pertaining <WG3588> to <WG4314> God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> I will <WG5111> not <WG3756> dare <WG5111> to speak <WG2980> of any things <WG5100> save those which <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> wrought <WG2716> through <WG1223> me <WG1700>, for the obedience <WG5218> of the Gentiles <WG1484>, by <WG1223> word <WG3056> and <WG2532> deed <WG2041>,

in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders <WG5059>, in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of the Holy <WG2316> Spirit <WG4151>; so <WG5620> that from <WG575> Jerusalem <WG2419>, and <WG2532> round about <WG2945> even unto <WG3360> Illyricum <WG2437>, I <WG3165> have fully preached <WG4137> the gospel <WG2098> of Christ <WG5547>;

yea <WG1161>, making it my aim <WG5389> so <WG3779> to preach the gospel <WG2097>, not <WG3756> where <WG3699> Christ <WG5547> was already named <WG2443>, that <WG3361> I might not build <WG3618> upon <WG1909> another man <WG245>'s foundation <WG2310>;

but <WG235>, as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, They shall see <WG3700>, to whom <WG3739> no <WG3756> tidings <WG312> of <WG4012> him <WG846> came <WG312>, And <WG2532> they <WG3739> who have <WG191> not <WG3756> heard <WG191> shall understand <WG4920>.
Wherefore <WG1352> also <WG2532> I was <WG1465> hindered <WG1465> these many <WG4183> times from coming <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>:

but <WG1161> now <WG3570>, having <WG2192> no more <WG3371> any place <WG5117> in <WG1722> these <WG5125> regions <WG2824>, and <WG1161> having <WG2192> these <WG575> many <WG4183> years <WG2094> a longing <WG1974> to come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>,

whensoever <WG1437> I go unto <WG1519> Spain <WG4681> (for <WG1063> I hope <WG1679> to see <WG2300> you <WG5209> in my journey <WG1279>, and <WG2532> to be brought on my way <WG4311> thitherward <WG1563> by <WG5259> you <WG5209>, if <WG1437> first <WG4412> in some measure I shall have <WG1705> been <WG3313> satisfied <WG1705> with <WG575> your company <WG5216>)â€”
but <WG1161> now <WG3570>, I say <WG4198>, I go unto <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419>, ministering <WG1247> unto the saints <WG40>.

For <WG1063> it hath been the good pleasure <WG2106> of Macedonia <WG3109> and <WG2532> Achaia <WG882> to make <WG4160> a <WG2842> certain <WG5100> contribution <WG2842> for <WG1519> the poor <WG4434> among the saints <WG40> that are <WG3588> at <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2419>.

Yea <WG1063>, it hath been their good pleasure <WG2106>; and <WG2532> their <WG846> debtors <WG3781> they are <WG1526>. For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the Gentiles <WG1484> have been made partakers of <WG2841> their <WG846> spiritual things <WG4152>, they owe <WG3784> it to them also <WG2532> to minister <WG3008> unto them <WG846> in <WG1722> carnal things <WG4559>.

When <WG2005> therefore <WG3767> I have accomplished <WG2005> this <WG5124>, and <WG2532> have sealed <WG4972> to them <WG846> this <WG5126> fruit <WG2590>, I will go <WG565> on by <WG1223> you <WG5216> unto <WG1519> Spain <WG4681>.
And <WG1161> I know <WG1492> that <WG3754>, when I come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>, I shall come <WG2064> in <WG1722> the fulness <WG4138> of the blessing <WG2129> of Christ <WG5547>.

Now <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, by <WG1223> our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> by <WG1223> the <WG1223> love <WG26> of the Spirit <WG4151>, that ye strive together <WG4865> with me <WG3427> in <WG1722> your prayers <WG4335> to <WG4314> God <WG2316> for <WG5228> me <WG1700>;

that <WG2443> I may be delivered <WG4506> from <WG575> them that are disobedient <WG544> in <WG1722> Judaea <WG2449>, and <WG2532> that <WG2443> my <WG3450> ministration <WG1248> which <WG3588> I have for <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419> may be <WG1096> acceptable <WG2144> to the saints <WG40>;

that <WG2443> I may come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> joy <WG5479> through <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> together with <WG4875> you <WG5213> find rest <WG4875>.
Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>. Amen <WG281>.
